choices.B: Check for response times in Nginx logs.
choices.D: Check the size of the database that the application is using.
choices.A: Check to make sure Nginx is running.
choices.C: Check to make sure the web API response is coming back in JSON.

questions.question_text: An end user is seeing long web page load times on the internal business application that they are trying to view. The user is seeing this issue across multiple web browsers, and other users encounter the same issue. Which action should the system administrator take to start looking for the cause of this issue?

choices.B: All logs are stored in their unstructured text format, and the ELK Stack performs data analysis by intelligently parsing the logs using machine learning algorithms.
choices.D: A single, comprehensive log format is defined on the ELK Stack. All incoming logs, regardless of format, are transformed to match the comprehensive format, and only applicable fields are populated.
choices.A: All devices that generate syslogs must use agents that process the local logs and transmit them in a specific format to the ELK Stack.
choices.C: All different message formats are parsed separately using custom filters, and the resulting structured data is stored for later analysis.

questions.question_text: How long analysis systems such as Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana Stack handle ingesting unstructured logs from different devices in various formats?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
You can have multiple log formats in the logstash filters section, therefore C is "more correct"

choices.B: a product engineering approach that lacks a formal methodology
choices.A: designing an application with fuzzy logic that makes it hard to predict
choices.C: splitting a project between teams that do not communicate with each other
choices.D: introducing problems into a system to study behavior and improve reliability

discussion.content: A and E as they guarantee the 'secure' part of this question which I think is the important part as they directly contribute to security and reliability.

questions.question_text: A developer is nearing the end of a software development cycle and is ready to deploy the software. The customer wants to continue using a secure software development lifecycle methodology and must plan for postproduction components. Which two areas should be the developer address? (Choose two.)
Which type of security testing should be performed as a part of a CI/CD pipeline by analyzing the source code itself without compiling the code into a running executable?

discussion.content: D is correct. Static Analysis and Unit Tests run checks without executing the code
